event.description:
Military Minister: Good afternoon, Grand
Leader.

Military Minister: Though it pains me to ask, the
military has fallen on hards times and I need cash
to make ends meet. However, we of course
must be discreet. Simply spend ₸10 on building
projects this turn. My people will see to it that
the funds end up in the right hands.
Military Minister: You are as wise as you are generous.
Military Minister: I will not forget this betrayal!
